description:
### Context
This dataset contains news headlines of two Dutch news websites. All sarcastic headlines were collected from the [Speld.nl](https://speld.nl/) (the Dutch equivalent of The Onion) whereas all "normal" headlines were collected from the news website [Nu.nl](https://www.nu.nl/). 

### Content
Next to the news headlines the dataset contains a sarcasm label, the source, and the news subject. News on three different subjects was collected: politics, foreign, and domestic news. Some headlines appear multiple times because they are listed under multiple subjects. For some applications, it might be useful to delete duplicates. The following columns are available:

* Headline: the original news headline
* link: the URL to the original news article
* source: either speld.nl or nu.nl
* is_sarcastic: boolean (speld being sarcastic and nu.nl not)
* is_binnenland: boolean for news category which translates to "domestic news"
* is_buitenland: boolean for news category which translates to "foreign news"
* is_politiek: boolean for news category which translates to "political news"


### Acknowledgements
The idea for creating this dataset was sparked by [the dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/rmisra/news-headlines-dataset-for-sarcasm-detection) from Rishabh Misra which contains English news headlines.


### Inspiration

Can you detect sarcastic news headlines? Is sarcasm harder to detect in certain subjects of news?
title: Dutch news headlines for sarcasm detection
